name: Sugar Free (NecroBlader, Famp)
description:
Sugar Free is a platformer game where you control a sugar made fox that must climb to the top of the lighthouse as the chocolate sea level is rising up thanks to the pouring rain.You must avoid the drips of chocolate that fall from the platforms as well as fall into the sea, since everything can melt you donw!

   Can you reach the top level of the lighthouse to marry your beloved coffee fox? It's the only opportunity you'll have, since it's raining alongside the sun, so don't miss your chance!
